Posts.Title: abnormal core biopsy results! Freaking out! SLNeu momofmeg
abnormal core biopsy results! Freaking out! SLNeu momofmeg

Posts.Content: SLNeu wrote: I am 38 years old, 10 years ago in my right breast I had a fibroadenoma removed from my right breast. 2 months ago I found another lump went to the doctor had the mammogram, the ultrasound and Thursday had the core needle biopsy. Today the doctor herself called me with the results and told me that there were abnormal cells and that we would need to remove the lump (would set up time and date tomorrow) biospsy it and would have the results within hours and basically go from there. What does abnormal mean?? I'm freaking out!! Should I be? My mother unfortunately had breast cancer but due to a heart condition it was inoperable, and later passed a year or so later in unrelated health reasons. Any input would be greatly apprecaited!! Sherri Log in to post a reply
